packs.pack_description: Reduces the amount of rain particles for easier vision.
Reduces the amount of snow particles for easier vision.
Makes many particles transparent or hollow for easier vision.
Removes cherry leaves particles for easier visibility in cherry groves.
Removes all particles for easier vision.
Gets rid of the border on the edges of Glass to make it cleaner and more transparent.
Gets rid of the border on the edges of Stained Glass to make them cleaner and more transparent.
Gets rid of the border on the edges of Tinted Glass to make it cleaner and more transparent.
Gets rid of the streaks in Glass, making it look cleaner.
Gets rid of the streaks in Stained Glass, making them look cleaner.
Gets rid of the streaks in Tinted Glass, making it look cleaner.
Creates a hole in the top of scaffolding, allowing you to traverse up and down them more comfortably.
Changes the enchantment glint to a much more sleek and less overpowering glint.
Lowers fire for easier vision when you are burning.
Lowers Shields in the first-person perspective to provide for wider visibility.
Removes the render distance fog effect.
Increases visibility when wearing a Pumpkin.
Makes Pumpkin overlay orange tinted.
Removes the Pumpkin overlay completes when worn.
Increases visibility when zooming in with a Spyglass.
Removes the Spyglass overlay completely when zooming in.
Removes the darkened corners of the screen in Fancy mode.
Renders the Totem of Undying as completely invisible when in first person mode.
Turns the portal blocks translucent to make it easier to see through
Makes utility items such as Food, Totems, Firework Rockets and Potions smaller.
Moves the sword lower for easier visibility.
Makes normal item frames invisible. (Careful, you might loose them :P)
Makes glowing item frames invisible. (Careful, you might loose them :P)
